Title: Loaded Weapon 1
Writer: Don Holley (story), Tori Tellem (story), Don Holley (screenplay), Gene Quintano (screenplay)
Actors: Emilio Estevez, Samuel L. Jackson, Jon Lovitz, Tim Curry
Plot: An LA detective is murdered because she has microfilm with the recipe to make cocaine cookies. A "Lethal Weapon" style cop team tries to find and stop the fiends before they can dope the nation by distributing their wares via the "Wilderness Girls" cookie drive.
